MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA11 postcode area of St Helen's. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:22am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting additional resources to arrive on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:35 AM on Tuesday, 12 January 2021.
